title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs and mix with grated parmesan.
Combine spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery and creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
